name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Firmware Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a strong foundation in **C**, **C++**, and **Python** development, specializing in designing secure, efficient firmware solutions. My expertise encompasses creating robust systems with **RTOS** and **Linux**, ensuring high-performance functionality for embedded applications. I have extensive experience with **UART**, **NVMe**, and **ATA** protocols alongside a comprehensive understanding of secure boot strategies, cryptographic signatures, and hardware root-of-trust implementations.
Additionally, I am proficient in using **JTAG** for debugging and in-circuit emulation (**ICE**), as well as utilizing **Git** for version control and collaborative projects. My background in developing systems with wear-leveling, garbage collection, and ECC showcases my ability to enhance reliability and data integrity. Beyond technical skills, my strengths include conducting R&D for next-generation firmware solutions, aligning with industry standards, and driving innovation across multifaceted projects.
